title: Jimi Plays Monterey
creator_credit: D.A. Pennebaker, Alan Douglas and Pennebaker Associates
brief_description: In 1967 America experienced the Monterey International Pop Festival. Acclaimed artists performed for thousands of wild fans. Jimi Hendrix performed at this festival, capturing the audience with incredible music, and Hendrix is shown playing his guitar with his teeth, behind his head, and in other wild ways.
